name: BoHo Shoulder Bag made of Recycled Materials
description:
This bag is made of 100% recycled fabric and plastic shopping bags  (the yarn which is a recycled cotton blend). The front panel is made of a recycled tablecloth and it is hand silk screened with a Much Love. Peace original design. 

The fabric for the back panel and inner lining were donated from the surplus of a home makeover. The back panel is a hand screened floral print and the interior is 100% Thai silk. There is a larger inner pocket made from recycled curtains. The panels are reinforced with recycled fused plastic bags to give a structure. 

The strap and siding is crocheted from a recycled cotton blend yarn with a thai silk patch to close the strap at the top. 

The bag is the perfect size and the crocheted strap makes it super comfy and chic. 

Enjoy being green with this sustainable piece.
